languages.text: "На моем прежнем корабле говорили: "Есть один способ сбежать от пустотного кракена — протаранить его насквозь". Тараньте, капитан".
"We had a saying on my old ship: the only way to escape a void kraken is to ram right through it. Ram the kraken, Captain."
languages.original_text: "На моем прежнем корабле говорили: "Есть один способ сбежать от пустотного кракена — протаранить его насквозь". Тараньте, капитан".

traits.locale_text: "We had a saying on my old ship: the only way to escape from a void kraken is to ram it through. Ram the kraken, Captain."
"We had a saying on my old ship: the only way to escape from a void kraken is to ram it through. Ram the kraken, Captain."
"We had a saying on my old ship: the only way to escape a void kraken is to ram right through it. Ram the kraken, Captain."
"We had a saying on my old ship: the only way to escape a void kraken is to ram right through it. Ram the kraken, Captain."
"We had a saying on my old ship: the only way to escape a void kraken is to ram right through it. Ram the kraken, Captain."
"We had a saying on my old ship: the only way to escape a void kraken is to ram right through it. Ram the kraken, Captain."

languages.text: "Wir hatten auf meinem alten Schiff eine Redensart: Einem Leerenkraken entkommt man nur, wenn man durch ihn durchfliegt. Rammt den Kraken, Captain."
languages.original_text: "We had a saying on my old ship: the only way to escape a void kraken is to ram right through it. Ram the kraken, Captain."

traits.locale_text: "Wir hatten auf meinem alten Schiff eine Redensart: Einem Leerenkraken entkommt man nur, wenn man durch ihn durchfliegt. Rammt den Kraken, Captain."

languages.text: « Sur mon ancien vaisseau, on avait un dicton : la seule manière d'échapper à un kraken du vide, c'est de lui foncer dedans. Alors, foncez dans le kraken, capitaine. »
languages.original_text: "We had a saying on my old ship: the only way to escape a void kraken is to ram right through it. Ram the kraken, Captain."

traits.locale_text: « Sur mon ancien vaisseau, on avait un dicton : la seule manière d'échapper à un kraken du vide, c'est de lui foncer dedans. Alors, foncez dans le kraken, capitaine. »

languages.text: «En mi anterior nave, teníamos un dicho: la única forma de escapar de un kraken del vacío es atravesarlo. Embista al kraken, capitán».
languages.original_text: "We had a saying on my old ship: the only way to escape a void kraken is to ram right through it. Ram the kraken, Captain."

traits.locale_text: «En mi anterior nave, teníamos un dicho: la única forma de escapar de un kraken del vacío es atravesarlo. Embista al kraken, capitán».

languages.text: 「かつて乗った船には、こんな言い習わしがあった。『ヴォイド・クラーケンから逃れる唯一の方法は、真正面から突っ切ることだ』とな。中隊長、クラーケンに突っ込め」
languages.original_text: "We had a saying on my old ship: the only way to escape a void kraken is to ram right through it. Ram the kraken, Captain."

traits.locale_text: 「かつて乗った船には、こんな言い習わしがあった。『ヴォイド・クラーケンから逃れる唯一の方法は、真正面から突っ切ることだ』とな。中隊長、クラーケンに突っ込め」

languages.text: “在我之前那艘船上，有句话是这么说的：想从虚空海怪面前逃命，唯一的方法就是从它身上撞过去。把它撞碎吧，上尉。”
languages.original_text: "We had a saying on my old ship: the only way to escape a void kraken is to ram right through it. Ram the kraken, Captain."

traits.locale_text: “在我之前那艘船上，有句话是这么说的：想从虚空海怪面前逃命，唯一的方法就是从它身上撞过去。把它撞碎吧，上尉。”

languages.text: "Eski gemimde bir deyişimiz vardı: Bir uçsuz krakeninden kaçmanın tek yolu, ona doğruca mahmuzla girmektir. Krakene mahmuzu geçirme vakti Kaptan."
languages.original_text: "We had a saying on my old ship: the only way to escape a void kraken is to ram right through it. Ram the kraken, Captain."
